rsvp.title: RSVP
rsvp.subtitle: Please respond by May 1st, 2024
rsvp.cardTitle: We Hope You Can Join Us!
rsvp.cardDescription: Please fill out the form below to let us know if you'll be attending our special day.
rsvp.dietaryPlaceholder: Please let us know about any dietary restrictions or food allergies...
rsvp.songPlaceholder: Any song you'd like to hear at the reception?
rsvp.accommodations: I need information about local accommodations
rsvp.messagePlaceholder: Share your well wishes or any special message...
rsvp.thankYouMessage: Your RSVP has been received. We can't wait to celebrate with you!

details.title: Event Details
details.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our special day
details.venueDescription: Our ceremony will take place in the beautiful rose garden, followed by cocktail hour and dinner reception in the grand ballroom. The venue features stunning views and elegant architecture perfect for our celebration.
details.dressCodeDescription: Think wedding guest chic! Ladies can wear cocktail dresses or dressy separates. Gentlemen can wear dress shirts with slacks and optional tie or sport coat. Please avoid white, ivory, or cream colors.
details.parkingDescription: Complimentary valet parking will be available at the venue. Uber and Lyft are readily available in the area.
details.accommodationsDescription: We have room blocks at nearby hotels. Please mention the "Smith-Johnson Wedding" for special rates. Contact us for details.
details.dinnerDescription: A plated dinner will be served with vegetarian and gluten-free options available. Please note any dietary restrictions in your RSVP.
details.photographyDescription: We'll have a professional photographer, but feel free to take photos! Please share them with #SarahAndMichael2024.
details.questionsDescription: If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out to us directly or contact our wedding coordinator, Emily, at emily@gardenmanor.com or (555) 123-4567.
